* TaskList class contains a list in which stores all the tasks that the user has inputted and not deltted
* TaskList constructor to intialize a new empty TaskList
* TaskList constructor to intialize a new TaskList with a given ArrayList of tasks
* the tasks are all stored as string format which is processed before being
* added to the current task list
* Adds a task to the task list
* Returns The task inside the task list at the index specified

* Returns a ToDoTask based on the user input and adds it to the list
* @param action  The string action input by the user
* Returns a EventTask based on the user input and adds it to the list

* Returns a DeadLineTask based on the user input and adds it to the list
* @param action  The string action input by the user
* Returns A task that is mark as done
* The task at the specified index is

* Returns the task that was at specified index is now removed.

* Returns a String containing the tasks that have this date

String result = "Here are the tasks due on the date: \n";
* Returns a List of tasks that match the keyword inputted

* UI class that is responsible for reading user input and printing
* Constructor to initialize the UI Class
String introduction = "     Hello! I'm Duke\n" + "     What can I do for you?\n";
String farewell = "     Bye. Hope to see you again soon!\n";
* Prints the message when a task is added.
String printAddTask = "     Got it. I've added this task: \n";
* Prints the error when attempting to load file message.
String unableToLoad = "     Unable to load file. Creating new one\n";
* Prints out the number of tasks inside the TaskList
String countTasksMessage = "     Now you have " + list.getList().size() + " tasks in the list. \n";
* Prints the message when a task is removed.
String removeTasksMessage = "     Noted. I've removed this task: \n";
* Prints the message when a task is marked.
String taskMarkedMessage = "     Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n";
* @param list the Task list to be printed

* Prints out the matching message when user is finding for a keyword in the list

* DukeException class is a class for all the exceptions thrown
* during execution of the Duke program
* It inherit from the Java exception class
* DukeException constructor used to initialize the Exception
* DukeFileNotFoundException class is a class for all the exceptions thrown
* when the file to load cannot be found
* It inherit from the DukeException class
* DukeIncompleteInputException class is a class for all the exceptions thrown
* Caused by a command that does not add a task to the task list
* during execution of the Duke program
* It inherit from the Java DukeException class
* DukeException constructor used to initialize the Exception
* @param action causing the exception to be thrown
* DukeOnlyIOException class is a class for all the IO exceptions thrown during Duke
* It inherit from the DukeException class
* DukeOnlyIOException constructor used to initialize the Exception
* MissingTaskInputException class is a class for all the exceptions thrown when
* A task related command is inputted but there is incomplete input
* MissingTaskInput class constructor to initialize an instance
* @param action the action causing the exception to be thrown
super("      OOPS!!! The description of a " + action + " cannot be empty.");
* UnknownInputException class is a class for all the exceptions thrown
* when Duke faces an input it does not know
* It inherit from the DukeException class
super("      OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(");
* DetailTask class models an actual task that the user is about to do or has completed
* with a given deadline. It also inherits from the Task class.
/** The deadline of the deadline task */
* Constructor to initalize a Deadline Task

* Returns the deadline of the task formatted to be dd-MM-YYYY

* Returns the deadline as a LocalDate Object

* EventTask class models an actual task that the user is about to do or has completed
* with a given timing of the task. It also inherits from the Task class.
* @param description the description of the EventTask
* Returns the timing of the event task formatted to be dd-MM-YYYY
* Returns the timing of the event task formatted to be dd-MM-YYYY.
* Returns the timing of the event task as a LocalDate
* toString method of EventTask which prints out details of the EventTask
* Task class models an actual task that the user is about to do or has completed
* Its details include the description as well as the type of the task
